description: Get google sheets by adding your google sheet id , plugin will show all the sheets in that google sheet , you can see details of all as well!
name: Google Sheets
plugin_instructions:
Create your app on google developer console here:

https://console.cloud.google.com/

Enable service and apis add google sheets :
https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/api/sheets.googleapis.com


copy your app key/id and app secret by making oauth screen 2.0


copy them back to your plugin page and its ready to be used.


Details:

see how to configure it!

https://www.loom.com/share/be53ddab5c1b42d09b98ec44fd3bb15b
